author: Staff Reporter
text:
A free one-day training programme on ‘Integrated nutrient management in tomato, brinjal and bhendi’ will be held on the Krishi Vigyan Kendra in Veterinary College and Research Institute premises on Mohanur Road on February 9.

A press release from N. Akila, Senior Scientist and Head, said that the programme would deal with cultivation methods, identifying the soil wealth and improving it and use of fertilizers in a balanced manner.

For registration, one can visit the KVK in person or register through phone: 04286-266345 and 266650.

Last date for registration is February 8.
title: Training programme
